name: TONCHENGSD Women's Gothic Punk Plaid Pleated High Waisted Short A-line Flare Mini Skirt
reviews: This skirt truly deserves a one star which is very sad. I ordered this skirt because I needed it for a holiday party. It actually arrived the day of the party and I was excited to try it on. Once it arrived, I took it out from the package to try it on and right when I tried to zip it down, the zipper broke. I also noticed that one of the hooks for the ribbon was coming undone. It looks cute and fashionable online but the material/ the poor way it was made is not worth the money. This is a definite return. Thank goodness that I went with my gut and went out to get another skirt just in case this one did not work.

name: TONCHENGSD Women's Gothic Punk Plaid Pleated High Waisted Short A-line Flare Mini Skirt
reviews: I purchased this skirt for a Halloween costume. I wanted something I could wear more than once and this skirt very much pulled through! It is very cute, easy to put on, and very stylish (ESPECIALLY FOR US PLUS SIZE GIRLS). The only reason I gave it four stars is because the little metal pieces in the front and the ribbon that came with it are very cheap material. The metal pieces and string both look like something from a craft store. With Amazon, though, it is usually a hit or miss on clothes quality. Other than that, the skirt is machine washable (DO NOT PUT IT IN THE DRYER OR THE METAL PIECES WILL COME OFF!!!), and the zipper to zip up the skirt is pretty decent. It is a very cute and fashionable skirt.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 6 December 2022

name: TONCHENGSD Women's Gothic Punk Plaid Pleated High Waisted Short A-line Flare Mini Skirt
